description:
I mentioned in the last film that I wanted to put Zack in a more "top" oriented position, but not only that, I've been trying to find someone he would have a genuine spark with. Zack actually likes his boys twink-like, and when I heard from Nick, I figured it would be a great pairing.
Zack does great breaking in the straight guys, but it IS a little hard on the self-esteem when you are having sex with someone who is just getting paid to do it. It was time to put him with someone who would be as interested in him as he would be.
Pretty sure Zack is now playing full time on Team Gay, and was he ever in to this video. It shot itself, and I actually had to slow down on the kissing.
A hot cum shot with spooge lickin and snowballin too!
I only wish I had a video camera at the hotel they were staying at, cuz I heard they went for round two later that night. Now that is chemistry!
title: Nick Angels & Zack Randall - Wrapped
